author: jsdelfino
msg: Enable a binding URI to be correctly combined with a node's base URI in the following cases: it starts with a /, but the base URI still needs to be prepended to it, the base URI contains or ends with a URI fragment delimiter (as it's the case with EJB corbaname URIs), or the URI uses an opaque scheme.
